parameters.query:
WITH sabotadores_unicos AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT us.sabotador_id
  FROM usuarios_sabotadores us
  WHERE us.usuario_id = $1::uuid
),
quest_progress AS (
  SELECT 
    uq.id as quest_id,
    uq.sabotador_id,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE qr.status = 'concluida') as concluidas,
    COUNT(*) as total
  FROM usuarios_quest uq
  INNER JOIN quests_recorrencias qr ON qr.usuarios_quest_id = uq.id
  WHERE uq.usuario_id = $1::uuid
    AND uq.sabotador_id IS NOT NULL
    AND uq.status IN ('disponivel', 'ativa', 'inativa')
  GROUP BY uq.id, uq.sabotador_id
)
SELECT 
  su.sabotador_id,
  sc.nome as sabotador_nome,
  sc.emoji as sabotador_emoji,
  uq.id as quest_id,
  COALESCE(uq.config->>'titulo', qc.titulo) as quest_titulo,
  COALESCE(qp.concluidas, 0)::int as concluidas,
  COALESCE(qp.total, 0)::int as total,
  CASE WHEN COALESCE(qp.total, 0) > 0 
    THEN ROUND((COALESCE(qp.concluidas, 0)::numeric / qp.total) * 100)
    ELSE 0 
  END as percentual
FROM sabotadores_unicos su
JOIN sabotadores_catalogo sc ON sc.id = su.sabotador_id
LEFT JOIN usuarios_quest uq ON uq.sabotador_id = su.sabotador_id 
  AND uq.usuario_id = $1::uuid
  AND uq.status IN ('disponivel', 'ativa', 'inativa')
LEFT JOIN quests_catalogo qc ON uq.catalogo_id = qc.id
LEFT JOIN quest_progress qp ON qp.quest_id = uq.id AND qp.sabotador_id = su.sabotador_id
ORDER BY su.sabotador_id, quest_titulo;

WITH sabotadores_unicos AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT us.sabotador_id
  FROM usuarios_sabotadores us
  WHERE us.usuario_id = $1::uuid
),
quest_progress AS (
  SELECT 
    uq.id as quest_id,
    uq.sabotador_id,
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE qr.status = 'concluida') as concluidas,
    COUNT(*) as total
  FROM usuarios_quest uq
  INNER JOIN quests_recorrencias qr ON qr.usuarios_quest_id = uq.id
  WHERE uq.usuario_id = $1::uuid
    AND uq.sabotador_id IS NOT NULL
    AND uq.status IN ('disponivel', 'ativa', 'inativa')
  GROUP BY uq.id, uq.sabotador_id
)
SELECT 
  su.sabotador_id,
  sc.nome as sabotador_nome,
  sc.emoji as sabotador_emoji,
  uq.id as quest_id,
  COALESCE(uq.config->>'titulo', qc.titulo) as quest_titulo,
  COALESCE(qp.concluidas, 0)::int as concluidas,
  COALESCE(qp.total, 0)::int as total,
  CASE WHEN COALESCE(qp.total, 0) > 0 
    THEN ROUND((COALESCE(qp.concluidas, 0)::numeric / qp.total) * 100)
    ELSE 0 
  END as percentual
FROM sabotadores_unicos su
JOIN sabotadores_catalogo sc ON sc.id = su.sabotador_id
LEFT JOIN usuarios_quest uq ON uq.sabotador_id = su.sabotador_id 
  AND uq.usuario_id = $1::uuid
  AND uq.status IN ('disponivel', 'ativa', 'inativa')
LEFT JOIN quests_catalogo qc ON uq.catalogo_id = qc.id
LEFT JOIN quest_progress qp ON qp.quest_id = uq.id AND qp.sabotador_id = su.sabotador_id
ORDER BY su.sabotador_id, quest_titulo;
